Html:
Hi!

If it is possible please provide BehaviorBase<T> where T : UIElement in next release

This is need to handle basic events throught custom behaviors (for example Grid.Loaded, Grid.XXXKeyDownXXX etc).

Can I use modified CommandBehaviorBase<T> code inside my open source project (all credits given)? Can I publish blog posts with source-code and credits to compositewpf of how I use modified BehaviorBase class in order to achieve some specifical things?

 

Thanks!
